item.title: Video Maker for Website Interview Style Video - San Jose CA - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a skilled video maker to create a 2-3 minute video for my website. The video will be interview style, where you will record, edit, and produce the final product. I will provide a Q&A style script and guidance on the content, but I need someone who can bring their creative touch and make the video engaging and professional. The main focus will be on showcasing my services and expertise as a ghostwriter. (See sallycollings dot com)
As well as the 2-3 minute video, I'd like the video maker to create some spinoff pieces (video or still) I can use for social media.
Must be filmed in-person - I'm based in San Jose.

  Skills required:
  - Videography and video editing
  - Interviewing skills
  - Storytelling through video
  - Knowledge of video production techniques
  - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

I'm a solopreneur, so I'm looking for someone who can work closely with me and understand my vision. This is a great opportunity to showcase your video-making skills and collaborate with a high-level ghostwriter and book expert.

  Size: Small
  Duration: Under 1 month
  Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $1,200
Posted On: June 24, 2024 18:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: UGC Woman Creator needed for injury tik tok video - Upwork
item.description:
We're seeking a talented UGC creator to help produce an engaging insurance claims video for TikTok. This project involves creating a compelling 20-30 second video where you'll portray a conversation with yourself.

Requirements:

Female actress
Age: 20-40 years
Ability to deliver a convincing and relatable performance
If you're creative and enthusiastic about this small video project, we'd love to hear from you!








Budget: $75
Posted On: June 24, 2024 17:45 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:UGC, TikTok Video, TikTok Ad
Skills: UGC, TikTok Video, TikTok Ad
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Create Youtube Intro - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone to create a short 10-15 second video intro for my new Youtube channel.
The brand is about visiting Orlando, Florida. I would like to incorporate the logo in the intro. I will send the logo when hired.


Budget: $15
Posted On: June 24, 2024 17:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
